queries.description: List of hashtags to search public posts for.

polling_interval.description: How often API is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the `polling_interval` times the number of `queries`.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.description: When a url request fails, number of times to attempt a retry before giving up.

nio/Instagram.Description: Polls Instagram for public posts, given a hashtag. The hashtag can be in either the caption or comments. Official documentation of [Instagram API hashtags](http://instagram.com/developer/endpoints/tags/).

lookback.description: On start, lookback this amount of time and grab old posts.

queries.description: List of users to search public posts for.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

polling_interval.description: How often API is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the `polling_interval` times the number of `queries`.

retry_limit.description: When a url request fails, number of times to attempt a retry before giving up.

nio/InstagramSearchByUser.Description: Polls Instagram for public posts by a specified user. Official documentation of [User Instagram API](http://instagram.com/developer/endpoints/users/).
